collection.title: Alek Miller's Game Projects
collection.description: Games, interactive experiences, and playable projects from The Azirona Drift
collection.author: Alek Miller

projects.title: Round Down Card Game
projects.shortDescription: Strategic card game featuring innovative mechanics and engaging gameplay.
projects.detailedDescription: Round Down is a strategic card game that combines mathematical thinking with tactical decision-making. Players must balance risk and reward as they work to reduce their hand value while blocking opponents. The game features unique mechanics that make every round engaging and unpredictable.
projects.collaboration: Art and visual design by Juleah Miller
awards: Indie Game Design Contest - Honorable Mention 2024
projects.excerpt: A game where every card played changes the landscape of possibility, and the path to victory requires both calculation and intuition.

projects.title: Interactive Game Narratives
projects.shortDescription: Narrative design for multiple game projects including dialogue trees and environmental storytelling.
projects.detailedDescription: A collection of interactive narrative projects exploring how player choice shapes story outcomes. These projects range from branching dialogue systems to environmental storytelling experiments, each designed to push the boundaries of player agency in digital narratives.
projects.excerpt: Stories that change based on your choices, where every decision echoes through the narrative landscape.

projects.title: Desert Winds Card Game
projects.shortDescription: Follow-up to Round Down with new mechanics and collaborative art development.
projects.detailedDescription: Desert Winds builds on the success of Round Down with new strategic elements inspired by the landscapes and challenges of the American Southwest. Players navigate shifting conditions and scarce resources while building their desert settlements.
projects.collaboration: Full art partnership with Juleah Miller
projects.concept: A game about thriving in harsh conditions through cooperation and smart resource management
projects.inspiration: Desert landscapes and stories of resilience in the American Southwest

projects.title: Kirbo Test Game
projects.shortDescription: PICO-8 test game to demonstrate the web game player functionality.
projects.detailedDescription: A small PICO-8 game used for testing the web game player system. This demonstrates how HTML-exported games can be embedded and played directly in the browser through the game player modal.
projects.excerpt: A simple test game to verify the web game player functionality works correctly.

projects.title: Browser Game Collection
projects.shortDescription: Collection of small browser-based games and interactive experiences.
projects.detailedDescription: A growing collection of experimental browser games, each exploring different mechanics and themes. These bite-sized experiences serve as testing grounds for new ideas and provide quick, accessible gaming experiences that can be played anywhere.
